content.rendered:
Our Seasonal En Masse collection is tailored for the minimalist who appreciates the elegance of simplicity. Featuring a minimalist design, that puts focus on highlights a single seasonal flower variety for full impact. No additional foliage is added.

We will select the best seasonal flowers, dependent on season. Though typically consist of 

  • Stock
  • Lisianthus
  • Matricaria Daisy (Camomile)
  • Dahlias
  • Delpinium
  • Tulips

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two seasonal flowers the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Flower dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
